name: lob
description: Demonstrating realtime connection between web browsers. Powered by ably.io

scripts.build: npm run -s build:scripts && npm run -s build:styles && npm run -s build:assets
scripts.build:styles: node-sass assets/styles/lob.scss > public/lob.css && node-sass assets/styles/phone-model.scss > public/phone-model.css
scripts.build:scripts: npm run build:scripts:flyer && npm run build:scripts:tracker && npm run build:scripts:vendor
scripts.build:scripts:vendor: cat assets/javascript/vendor/*.js > public/vendor.js && cat assets/javascript/vendor/chart/*.js > public/vendor-chart.js

author: Peter Saxton
